title: Charles Payne On How He Became A Successful Stock Market Investor By 18 Years Old
text:
Charles Payne, host of Making Money with Charles Payne 2pm ET on The Fox Business Network, joined Brian Kilmeade to talk about the democrats' plan to tax American's overall wealth on top of paying income tax and his new book "Unstoppable Prosperity" which helps the average American change the arc of their lives through actively investing in the stock market and increase their economic opportunity. You can get a FREE copy of Charles' book by going to UnstoppableProsperity.com
